weeklyTopNews.title: Restrictions on household gatherings unlikely to ease before Christmas, NSW premier warns
weeklyTopNews.summary: NSW Premier Gladys Berejiklian has revealed that Christmas celebrations could stay capped at twenty visitors even as the state recorded 3 days in a row without a locally acquired case.

weeklyTopNews.title: Victoria travel restrictions scrapped as state records no new Covid cases for nine days
weeklyTopNews.summary: The 25km travel limit and the separation of Regional Victoria from Metropolitan Melbourne have come to an end as Victoria recorded no new cases for the ninth day in a row.

weeklyTopNews.title: SA now has more active coronavirus cases than Victoria with a child joining tally
weeklyTopNews.summary: SA Health announce one new case today, a child in quarantine. The state now has 17 active cases, of which 16 are people returning from overseas, and the remaining is a close contact. Victoria has 15.

weeklyTopNews.title: Victoria has now gone six days without recording a single new coronavirus case
weeklyTopNews.summary: Melbourne's 14-day rolling average has now dropped to 1.4.

weeklyTopNews.title: COVIDSafe app of no 'material benefit' to coronavirus contact tracing, SA Police chief says
weeklyTopNews.summary: South Australian Police Commisioner Grant Stevens has expressed that the COVIDSafe application has been of "no material benefit," to local health authorities. South Australia and other states are moving to introduce QR code scanning at venues to assist with contact tracing
